Class MarkLogicQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.query.impl.AbstractOperation

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MarkLogicBooleanQuery, MarkLogicGraphQuery, MarkLogicTupleQuery, MarkLogicUpdateQuery

    public class MarkLogicQuery
extends org.openrdf.query.impl.AbstractQuery
implements org.openrdf.query.Query, MarkLogicClientDependent
    base query class
